hero.title: OFF-ROAD TRACK DAYS
hero.subtitle: Would you like to try out but not sure about taking the plunge? It's never been so easy, we're here to accompany you!

testoTop.title: Giornate in Pista Offroad
testoTop.subTitle: Vorresti provare ma non sei sicuro di fare il passo? Non è mai stato così facile, ci siamo noi ad accompagnarti!
testoTop.body:
Don't stop to look! Get on the saddle with us for a fun-filled day.
Everyone can take part in safety, children and adults, beginners and competitors alike. Everything is organized in one day on a specific track, within everyone's reach, with the support of the team that allows you to try out or train throughout the day.

GalleryTop.alt: Ponte a Egola - Innovation Racing Team

testoBottom.body:
We can go from the simplest and most fun track to the most beautiful circuits in Italy such as *Ottobiano, Ponte an Egola, Montevarchi*, and *Faenza* with the support of the team that will allow you to try or train in absolute tranquillity throughout the day.
If you don't have the technical clothing and the bike you can rent everything you need from us.

GalleryBottom.alt: Ponte a Egola - Innovation Racing Team

hero.title: SPEED TRACK DAYS
hero.subtitle: Live the experience of high speed

testoTop.title: Speed Track Days
testoTop.subTitle:
Would you like to try but are not sure to take the step?
It has never been so easy, we are there to accompany you!
testoTop.body:
Everyone can participate safely, both beginners and racers who have reached 18 years of age.
Everything is organized in one day in a specific track.

testoBottom.body:
But where do we go?
We can go from the simplest and most fun track as we can go to the most beautiful circuits in
Italy such as Mugello, Imola, Misano, and Vallelunga with the support of the team that will allow
you to try or train in absolute tranquility throughout the day.
If you don't have a motorcycle we can rent it to you, you just need to have the technical clothing.
testoBottom.footer: A day you will not forget so quickly!
